content.description: Sit start with a pair of edge. From there, reach a good right hand jug on the arete, then gain a left hand pinch, follow the lip, and mantel atop the boulder.
content.protection: At least a pad or two. The landing is good, but there is a tree branch that shares part of the landing.
content.location: It climbs the north facing arete of Minas Tirith.

content.description: Stand start with a hand on the arete. From there, paste the feet, bump up the arete, gain the good foot, then follow it as it goes slight right, eventually gain the lip, and mantel on top.
content.protection: A pair of pads. The immediate landing is great, but there is a rock behind the fall zone toward the end of the problem.
content.location: It climbs the south side of Minas Tirith's southwest arete.

content.description: Stand start with an edge. From there, climb up through a series of generous mini-shelves to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pad. It has a great landing.
content.location: It climbs the center of Minas Tirith's west-facing slab.

content.description: Sit start with hands matched on an edge. From there, gain a sloping right hand edge, follow to a great right hand edge, reach a left hand pocket next to it, stand up, reach the lip, and mantel on top.
content.protection: A pad. The landing is great here.
content.location: It climbs just to the right of House of Healing on Minas Tirith's east face.

content.description: Sit start with hands matched on an edge. From there, work up through a pair of edges, gain the jugs atop the sloping shelf, reach the lip, and make an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pad or two. The landing is perfect though.
content.location: It climbs just to the right of Hall of Feasts on the east side of Minas Tirith.

content.description: Sit start with a left hand sidepull-undercling edge and a right hand four-finger pocket. From there, gain a left hand pocket, follow to a right hand jug-sloper, match the left hand next to it, pull over the sloping shelf to a jug below the lip, bring the feet along, reach the lip, and mantel atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pad or two. The landing is great though.
content.location: It climbs the east side of Minas Tirith's southeast arete.
